title: Infinite Survival: I Can Plunder Passive Skills - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Ability Steal   Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Death   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Late Romance   Leadership   Level System   Lucky Protagonist   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Personality Changes   Poor to Rich   Pragmatic Protagonist   Ruthless Protagonist   Strong to Stronger   Survival   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   World Hopping
author: 8k Dollar   Eight Thousand Knives   八千刀
description:
The Infinite Survival System suddenly appeared on Planet Blue. Those who are chosen are forced to survive in dungeons.

The Survivors can continue to grow stronger if they survive the dungeon missions. However, just one failure and it would be their deaths.

Every Survivor gets a talent. Some talents can boost the Survivor’s agility, and some enhances their luck, while Zhou Chen’s talent was Passive Plunderer. It allows him to plunder the passive skills of the monsters he hunts.

With that talent, Zhou Chen slowly gathers a powerful list of passive skills.>
